lead_paragraph: Cam Newton directed a 68-yard drive in his only series, then stepped aside — for the most part — as the Carolina Panthers lost to the Baltimore Ravens 22-19 on Thursday night in a preseason opener.

headline.main: Newton Sharp in Only Series as Panthers Lose to Ravens 22-19
headline.print_headline: Newton Sharp in Only Series as Panthers Lose to Ravens 22-19
